ClassDesc: Listener used to register to live data updates from a @B_com#google#android#gms#fitness#data#DataSource_E@. Used by clients wanting to subscribe to live data stream updates via @B_com#google#android#gms#fitness#SensorsApi_E@. Each event is delivered as a @B_com#google#android#gms#fitness#data#DataPoint_E@.
